descript.abstract: This dataset represents Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA) Regional Bus Stop locations (permanent and temporary). The dataset includes bus stop identification, location, and inventory information (KFH bus stop inventory survey). All WMATA GIS data is stored and exported in WMATA LDP NAD 1983 [NSRS2007] US Feet.
descript.purpose: Planning and analysis. Feed information to Trapeze, Clever, ATIS, Orbital, Cubic (Farebox), Next Bus, WMATA Website, and Metroview (ArcGIS Server Flex Web applications).

idinfo.useconst: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.2.3574

dataqual.logic: Bus stop (Bus Planning) data is verifed through a series of routines checking for duplicate, street name, location (Longitude/Latitude and On/At street), jurisdiction, regional ID, bus stop position, and bus stop heading. The data is then imported into the database or updated.
dataqual.complete: The data set was initially derived from Gscan and later reconciled and integrated with Bus Planning Access DB, KFH Bus stop survey, and BusTool DB. The data set includes all compact jurisdictions WMATA bus stops.

procstep.procdesc: Project to WMATA LDP NAD 1983 [NSRS2007] US Feet

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
A unique integer ID assigned to each WMATA bus stop within the Clever Devices bus stop database.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop operating status type code

attrdomv.udom: The lifecycle status of the bus stop

The location of the bus stop relative to the AtStreet. Whether the bus crosses the AtStreet just after reaching the stop ("near"), just before ('far"), or somewhere in the middle of the block ("mid").
The name of the closest cross-street to the stop; or the nearest landmark or address, if there is no nearby cross-street; or the bus bay designator if the stop is in a transit station.
Bus stop operating future status type code
Bus stop service start date
The name of the street the bus is on while serving the stop; or the landmark or transit station where the stop is located, if it is not on a named road.
The compass orientation (in degrees) of the bus when it is stopped at the stop.
A unique seven-digit integer assigned to each bus stop of each transit agency in the WMATA service area.
A text description providing more detail on the exact loaction of the bus stop.
The bus stop description as given in bus on-board displays, usually the OnStreet and AtStreet names with a plus sign between them.
The longitude (X coordinate) of the bus stop, as referenced to the WGS 1984
The latitude (Y coordinate) of the bus stop, as referenced to the WGS 1984
The operational type of bus stop.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop inventory surveyor type code

attrdomv.udom: Person who recorded information about the bus stop. Note: All stops will have multiple surveyors.
Bus stop location (latitude and longitude) status
The date that the person recorded information about the bus stop.
The number of benches at the bus stop.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop bench seat type code

attrdomv.udom: Whether the benches at a bus stop are part of a shelter, or freestanding, or both
An agency or party responsible for maintaining the infocase.
Whether a bike rack is at the bus stop.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop has posted route schedule

attrdomv.udom: Whether route schedules are posted at the stop.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop has posted vicinity map

attrdomv.udom: Whether a map of the surrounding area is posted at the stop.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop has posted route map

attrdomv.udom: Whether a route map is posted at the stop.
Unique geographic feature identifer assigned within the WMATA enterprise GIS.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop pedestrian pad size type code

attrdomv.udom: The usable size of the pedestrian pad (as reduced by any obstructions).

attr.attrdef: Bus stop pedestrian pad material type code

attrdomv.udom: The material that the pedestrian pad is made of.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop pedestrian pad obstruction type code

attrdomv.udom: Type of permanent obstruction that impedes use of the pedestrian pad or reduce its usable area to less than 5'x8'.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop pedestrian pad has curb connection

attrdomv.udom: Whether the pedestrian pad connects to the on-street curb.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop has bus rear door pedestrian pad

attrdomv.udom: Whether the bus stop has a distinct, paved area for rear door alighting (not recorded if the area is part of the sidewalk).

attr.attrdef: Bus stop bus rear door pedestrian pad obstruction

attrdomv.udom: Whether the rear door pedestrian pad is 5'x8' and unobstructed.
The width of the above sidewalk at its narrowest part at the stop, taking into consideration planters, tree boxes, shelters, and other types of permanent obstructions (0 = no sidewalk).

attr.attrdef: Bus stop sidewalk has curb connection

attrdomv.udom: Whether the on-street sidewalk connects with on-street curb (no grassy/dirt area between sidewalk and curb).

attr.attrdef: Bus stop sidewalk has pedestrian pad connection

attrdomv.udom: Whether the sidewalk connects to the pedestrian pad at the stop (Only applies to stop with pedestrian pad).

attr.attrdef: Bus stop sidewalk slope wheelchair viable

attrdomv.udom: Whether the slope of the sidewalk appears to present difficulty for wheelchair navigation (>5% is too steep; goal is 2% or less).

attr.attrdef: bus stop sidewalk obstruction type code

attrdomv.udom: The type of streetside furnishing, construction, or landscaping that impedes pedestrian access to the bus stop via the sidewalk.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop sidewalk impedance type code

attrdomv.udom: The type of sidewalk condition that impedes pedestrian access to the bus stop.

attr.attrdef: On street near side curb ramp slope

attrdomv.udom: The average of three measurements (CurbRampSlope1, CurbRampSlope2, CurbRampSlope3) taken at the ramp nearest to the stop: one at the top of the ramp, one in the middle of the ramp, one at the bottom of the ramp.

attr.attrdef: On street near side curb ramp

attrdomv.udom: Whether there is a curb ramp to the on-street at the near-side of the intersection.

attr.attrdef: On street far side curb ramp

attrdomv.udom: Whether there is a curb ramp to the on-street onfar-side of the intersection.

attr.attrdef: At street at bus stop curb ramp

attrdomv.udom: Whether there is a curb ramp to the at-street on the near side of the intersection.

attr.attrdef: At street opposite bus stop curb ramp

attrdomv.udom: Whether there is a curb ramp to the at-street on the far side of the intersection.
Whether there is a crosswalk across the on-street on the near side of the intersection (or at the stop, for a mid-block bus stop).
Whether there is a crosswalk across the on-street on the far side of the intersection.

attr.attrdef: At street at bus stop crosswalk

attrdomv.udom: Whether there is a crosswalk across the at-street on the near side of the intersection.

attr.attrdef: At street opposite bus stop crosswalk

attrdomv.udom: Whether there is a crosswalk across the at-street on the far side of the intersection.

attr.attrdef: On street stop sign or traffic light

attrdomv.udom: Whether there is a traffic light or stop sign at the bus stop at the on-street location.
Whether there is a pedestrian crossing signal to cross the on-street
Whether there is a pedestrian crossing signal to cross the at-street

attr.attrdef: Bus stop parking restriction type code

attrdomv.udom: How parking is allowed or restricted at the bus stop.

attr.attrdef: Bus stop no parking zone length

attrdomv.udom: The length of the no parking zone at the stop (0 = none).
Whether there is contradictory information on multiple no-parking signs at the bus stop.
Whether there is a street light within 30 feet of the bus stop pole on the same side of the street.
Whether the bus stop has a LED display showing the next bus arrival.
Bus Stop Accessibility
Bus Bridge Stop
Whether the bus stop has a luminator sign
Whether the bus stop has power source
Whether the bus stop is MetroAccess Stop
Date in which the feature was created
Date in which feature was edited
Bus stop update mobile app last edited date
Bus stop update mobile app editor User ID
Last updated date for Maximo feed.
Coordinates defining the features.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
